value.fr: In these key areas, we link consumers to producers in order to create benefits for everybody involved in the value chain.

value.en: Taking an agribusiness approach to agricultural development can do much to provide income generating opportunities for rural communities, as well as helping to increase food security, reduce food imports and create jobs, especially for young people.
value.fr: Taking an agribusiness approach to agricultural development can do much to provide income generating opportunities for rural communities, as well as helping to increase food security, reduce food imports and create jobs, especially for young people.

value.en: The rapid technological changes taking place, especially in the areas of the Internet, mobile and data applications, create an enormous opportunity for growth in the agricultural sector.
value.fr: The rapid technological changes taking place, especially in the areas of the Internet, mobile and data applications, create an enormous opportunity for growth in the agricultural sector.

value.en: Building resilience for adaptation to climate change in the agriculture sector aims to increase the adaptive capacity of farmers and systems, both to recover from shocks and to be prepared for changes.
value.fr: Building resilience for adaptation to climate change in the agriculture sector aims to increase the adaptive capacity of farmers and systems, both to recover from shocks and to be prepared for changes.

value.en: The world does not stand still, and neither does CTA. We seek individuals and organisations aspiring to empower agricultural and rural communities in ACP countries.
value.fr: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

value.en: Agribusiness is key to tackling poverty in Africa, the Caribbean and the Pacific (ACP)
value.fr: Agribusiness is key to tackling poverty in Africa, the Caribbean and the Pacific (ACP)

value.en: Source: CTA Infographic 'The Business of Growing', 29 February 2016
value.fr: Source: CTA Infographic 'The Business of Growing', 29 February 2016

value.en: 260% required increase in crop production by 2050 to feed Africa’s projected population growth.
value.fr: 260% required increase in crop production by 2050 to feed Africa’s projected population growth.

value.en: Post-harvest losses in ACP countries amount up to 40% of harvests.
value.fr: Post-harvest losses in ACP countries amount up to 40% of harvests.

value.en: A 1% growth in agriculture pulls 0.41% of the population out of poverty, according to the International Monetary Fund (IMF)
value.fr: A 1% growth in agriculture pulls 0.41% of the population out of poverty, according to the International Monetary Fund (IMF)

value.en: Only 20% of trade in SSA is intra-regional, compared with 78% in the EU and 60% in Asia.
value.fr: Only 20% of trade in SSA is intra-regional, compared with 78% in the EU and 60% in Asia.

CTA is a joint institution operating under the framework of the Cotonou Agreement between the ACP Group of States (Africa, the Caribbean and the Pacific) and the EU Member States (European Union). CTA is funded by the European Union.
value.fr: Le CTA est une institution conjointe opérant dans le cadre de l'accord de Cotonou entre le groupe des États ACP (Afrique, Caraïbes et Pacifique) et les États membres de l'UE (Union européenne). Le CTA est financé par l'Union européenne.

body.en: I gained a lot in terms of self-confidence. I learnt so many tools that make my work more effective. In future I will be able to do more for the young people than I am doing now.
